title: Casual 5s team LF players (plat+)
body:
Hi, Free here, s4 diamond elo player
I'm currently looking for high elo players who can play in a semi serious environment for some good, casual fun. I will organise times once roster is full, all roles accepted. MSG me here or add me in game ("Free") for invite. Currently we have players ranging from Plat 5-Challenger. The aim of the team is to ultimately have fun playing League of Legends but on the side try to rank up a decent 5s team while working to improve individually as well as teamwork and co-ordination.
